# samsungcloudplatform_certificate (Data Source)

Provides a Certificate


## Example Usage

```terraform
data "samsungcloudplatform_certificate" "certificate" {
  certificate_id = "CERT-XXXXXXXXXX"
}

output "output_certificate" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatform_certificate.certificate
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `certificate_chain` (String) Certificate Chain
- `certificate_expiration_date` (String) Expiration Date
- `certificate_id` (String) Certificate id
- `certificate_name` (String) Certificate Name
- `certificate_start_date` (String) Start Date
- `certificate_state` (String) Certificate State
- `certificate_type` (String) Certificate Type
- `certificate_version` (String) Certificate Version
- `common_name` (String) Common Name
- `created_by` (String) Created By
- `created_by_email` (String) Certificate Created By Email
- `created_by_name` (String) Certificate Created By Name
- `created_dt` (String) Creation date
- `key_bit_size` (Number) Key Bit Size
- `modified_by` (String) Modified By
- `modified_dt` (String) Modified date
- `organization_name` (String) Organization Name
- `private_key` (String) Certificate Private Key
- `project_id` (String) Project Id
- `public_certificate` (String) Certificate Public(Body)
- `purpose_type` (String) Purpose Type
- `used_resource_count` (Number) Used Resource Count

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
